page.title: 11CIVIL SERVICE BUILDINGS
page.content: On Warbreck Hill is part of what is called North Fylde Central Office. There are five things dealt with on this site: 1.Mobility Allowance- a benefit payable to people who are unable to walk or have a limited mobility. 2.Family Income Supplement- payable to a person on a low wage, with at least one child, working at least 24 hours a week. 3.London Pensions. 4.Artificial Limb and Eye Centre- where limbs and eyes are made for disabled people. 5.Driving Test Centre. The site consists of three blocks, and is an accepted part of the local community, as well as providing many jobs.
